verbs.description: [V: is] [ARGM-DIS: santa claus] [ARG2: a ninja well he does have a black belt] [ARG1: an international team of santa clauses are training with ninjas in japan to hone their gift - delivery skills in time for the holiday season greenland international santa claus association denmark nhk new york santa abc radio japan saga prefecture instructor santa claus]
